definition: to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)

sentences.english: During choose the direct current power supply, pay attention to the negative and positive.
sentences.chinese: 選用直流供電時，注意正負極標識。

sentences.english: Instead they use materials with lattice structures for both positive and negative electrodes.
sentences.chinese: 取而代之的是在正極和負極上使用柵格結構材料。

sentences.english: Surface charge density of apoptotic cell was reduced by electret.
sentences.chinese: 負極性駐極體能減少凋亡細胞的表面電荷量。

sentences.english: Please notice the place of anode and cathode when pit in the batteries.
sentences.chinese: 安裝電池時請注意放好正負極位置。

sentences.english: Is the thermocouple positive and negative poles are consistent.
sentences.chinese: 是熱電偶的正負極是否一致。

sentences.english: That is how that works. By the way, this is the cathode.
sentences.chinese: 那就是它怎麼起作用的，順便說一下，這就是負極。

sentences.english: Must connect the laser tube correctly positively and negatively extremely.
sentences.chinese: 要正確連接激光管的正負極。

sentences.english: Do not directly touch terminal by hand.
sentences.chinese: 不要直接用手接觸電容器正負極。

sentences.english: On the other hand, prepared negative plate expander is commercially available.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，在商業上可購到現成的負極板膨脹劑。

sentences.english: Studies of tin-based anode materials for lithium ion secondary batteries are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了鋰離子電池錫基負極材料的研究進展。

sentences.english: Studies and developments of anode materials for lithium ion secondary battery are re- viewed.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了鋰離子二次電池負極材料的研究和進展。

sentences.english: The radio won't work, if you swap the cell's poles over.
sentences.chinese: 如果你把電池的正負極顛倒了，收音機就不會響了。

sentences.english: The life of titanium negative grid plated with copper was researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究了鈦上鍍銅負極板柵的壽命。

sentences.english: All kinds of lead acid batteries are aligned pull screen grid and punching board gate.
sentences.chinese: 各種鉛酸性電池正負極拉網板柵及衝孔板柵。

sentences.english: CAW were firstly reported to be applied as a cathode of the lithium-ion secondary batteries in the dissertation.
sentences.chinese: 本文首次將碳原子線用作鋰離子二次電池的負極材料。

sentences.english: For an uncoated capillary, the EOF is toward the negative electrode.
sentences.chinese: 如果是未加塗層的毛細管，電滲流朝負極移動。
